definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: Blush can be poured through a hidden semi-transparent cover, very fitting skin.
sentences.chinese: 腮红可透过隐藏的半透明罩倒出，极度贴合肌肤。

sentences.english: Clear glass cover allows observation of interior mechanism to aid in setting and checkout.
sentences.chinese: 透明玻璃盖允许观察内部机制，以帮助确定和检验。

sentences.english: Well, Translucency is one of those phenomenon that goes a bit beyond your everyday Lambertian diffuse.
sentences.chinese: 那么，这些现象是半透明多少超越你天天朗伯漫。

sentences.english: Sterile, crystal clear tips let you see transparent samples.
sentences.chinese: 完全透明的消毒吸头可查看透明的样本。

sentences.english: Sterile, crystal clear tips let you see transparent samples.
sentences.chinese: 完全透明的消毒吸头可查看透明的样本。

sentences.english: Initial tension melted into transparency and forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 最初的紧张融化为透明和饶恕。

sentences.english: Paper is made up of transparent fibers.
sentences.chinese: 纸是由透明纤维构成的。

sentences.english: Laurence says he is ‘relaxed’ about increased demands for transparency.
sentences.chinese: 对于不断增长的透明要求，劳伦斯说他觉得“释然”。

sentences.english: How again struggled hard, also not swim out this transparent boundaries.
sentences.chinese: 再怎么努力挣扎，也游不出这透明的界限。

sentences.english: Enables tinting the background that shows through in transparent mode.
sentences.chinese: 在透明模式下，对显示的背景进行着色。

sentences.english: She was also cut out in paper, but she had a dress of the clearest gauze.
sentences.chinese: 女郎也是用卡纸剪的，但是她却穿着透明的纱裙。

sentences.english: A method for determining both the optical constants and the thickness of thin films from transmission spectrum has been presented.
sentences.chinese: 给出了确定透明均匀薄膜光学常数和厚度的方法。

sentences.english: She wore a sexy see-through blouse to the cocktail party.
sentences.chinese: 她穿一件性感透明的上衣去参加鸡尾酒会。

sentences.english: At the neck of the wrecked deck, the reckoner checked the opaque cheque.
sentences.chinese: 在遇险的甲板的脖子，计算者检查不透明的支票。

sentences.english: In contrast, growth plate cartilage is primary cartilage and is made up of hyaline cartilage.
sentences.chinese: 生长板软骨为原发性软骨，由透明软骨构成。

sentences.english: I keep that clear plastic case where I can see it every day.
sentences.chinese: 我一直把那个透明的塑料盒摆在天天能看得到的地方。

definition: Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
